means: [人名] [北方英格兰人姓氏] 斯科勒职业名称，记帐人，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“记录”(to record)
[人名] [北方英格兰人姓氏] 斯科勒职业名称，侦察员或侦探，来源于中世纪英语、古法语，含义是“侦察”(to reconnoitre)

sentence.Network_en: He was Italy's top scorer during the World Cup matches.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是世界杯比赛期间意大利队进球最多的球员。

sentence.Network_en: Another prolific scorer is Dean Saunders.
sentence.Network_cn: 另外一个得分高手是迪安·桑德斯。

评分者信度(Scorer Reliability) 评分者信度是指不同评分者之间在测验结果计分上的一致性。 在心理测验中,评分者信度的计算,通常是随机抽取若干份试卷,由至少两位.

entry.tran: (足球、板球等的)得分运动员，得分手
entry.def: In football, cricket, and many other sports and games, a scorer is a player who scores a goal, runs, or points.

example.ex: ...David Hirst, the scorer of 11 goals this season.
example.tran: 戴维·赫斯特，本赛季有 11个入球的得分手

entry.def: A scorer is an official who writes down the score of a game or competition as it is being played.
You can refer to someone as a scorer when you are talking about what mark they achieved in a test.

example.ex: ...the top 2 per cent of scorers in IQ tests.
example.tran: 智商测试中分数在前百分之二的人

means.word_mean: 1. a player who makes a score in a game or contest
2. a logger who marks trees to be felled
3. an official who records the score during the progress of a game

sentences.en: He shared the honour of being the season’s top scorer with Andy Cole.
sentences.cn: 他和安迪·科尔共同分享了本赛季最佳得分手的荣誉称号。
